description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee /orangutan
group of session based on the test condition presented -whether the shadow or mirror condition was administered
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
within-participant manipulation (levels: shadow/ base/ control/ mirror)- the shadow and mirror conditions were blocked
order of mirror and shadow condition coded as shadow_first and mirror_first
order of mirror and shadow condition- numerical
location of the reward (l= left/ r= right)
whether the first choice was correct (directed to the location of the reward- 1= yes/ 0= no)
side of the first choice (l=left/ r= right)
